pong

Class EvolvedController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pong.Controller
      • pong.EvolvedController

  • public class EvolvedController
extends Controller
    The main objective of this class is to calculate the next step of the robot.
    Author:
    Sergii Zhevzhyk
